subSubSection.paragraph: Three workers from Brazil, RS, Sapiranga, Morro Alto do Ferrabraz (29°34'45,8"S, 50°56'76,2"W), 15.iv.2005, Fabiana Haubert & Elena Diehl col. Four workers from Brazil, SC, Sao Bonifacio , P.E. Serra do Tabuleiro (27°49'06"S, 48°54'41"W), 08-13.iii.2004, Silva, R.R.; Dietz, B.H. & Albuquerque, N.L. col. One worker from Brazil, SC, Sao Brazil, SC, S. Bento do Oxyepoecus vezenyii (Forel) . One gyne from Brazil: Sul, APA Rio Vermelho (26°21'51"S, 49°16'16"W), S P, Botucatu ("armadilha de solo, em pastagem"), 30.iii-04.iv.2001, Silva, R.R. & Eberhard, F. col. 09.i.1987, L.C. Forti col. One worker from Brazil, One worker from Brazil, S P, Tapirai (24°01'55"S, S P, Cunha. P.E. Serra do Mar. Nucleo Cunha-Indaia 47°27'56"W), 08-14.i.2001, Silva & Eberhard col. (23°15'03"S, 45°00'26"W), 21-22.iv.2001, A. Tava- (sample 10). res & R.R. Silva col. (sample 4).
